description.value:
This class feature functions as the artificer class feature, except that you can create only one healing infusion at the end of each extended rest.

@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.m2lFdRzWhg9p3j7S]{Healing Infusion: Curative Admixture}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.GeA89J6KaiXyFhHd]{Healing Infusion: Resistive Formula}@UUID[Compendium.dnd-4e-compendium.module-powers.BlaryTet0A4znCfN]{Healing Infusion: Shielding Elixir}
